DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine compare rehydration effect Essentia Water , electrolyzed high-pH bottled water , industry-standard bottle water purified reverse osmosis mineral add , ( 1 ) whole blood viscosity , ( 2 ) plasma osmolality , ( 3 ) bioelectrical impedance analysis , ( 4 ) body mass change , use serial measurement apparently healthy adult follow exercise-induced dehydration control environment .
DOC.criteria: Free medication least 1 week prior study Any chronic condition require regular treatment medical followup Bleeding disorder susceptible prolong uncontrolled bleeding Active infection Current smoker Subject BMI equal great 30 Use oral contraceptive previous 3 month Subject pregnant breastfeeding Currently menstruate
